#summary The area alt attribute specifies alternate text that describes the element in case it can not be displayed or the browser does not support it.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-whatwg

== Elements ==

You can use the `alt` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AppletElement <applet>]
  * [AreaElement <area>]
  * [ImgElement <img>]
  * [ObjectElement <object>]
